title: Can my HUAWEI MediaPad X1 7.0 function as a USB host? Can it work with an external USB flash drive, mouse, or printer?
answer:
Your HUAWEI MediaPad X1 7.0 can function as a USB host. You can connect it to a USB flash drive, mouse, or keyboard using a USB On-The-Go (OTG) cable. However, it cannot be connected to a printer.   

NOTE: Some peripheral devices may require separate power supplies.
